channel.title: How do I?
channel.description:
Ok can i change the amount to a bigger nuber of the code you can spawn? like for instance...
[code]::pickup 0995 999999999 [/code]
How do I change the 0995 to make you spawn a bigger number like a Java code like say...
[code]::pickup 10888 1[/code]
How would I make that work?

item.title: How do I?
item.dc:creator: @ZTR_Zac ZTR Zac
item.description:
@ZTR_Zac wrote:

No he means the amountyou can spawn at 1 time

Read full topic

item.title: How do I?
item.dc:creator: @trevor268 trevor268
item.description:
@trevor268 wrote:

you mean like so you can spawn the new items liek bandos and such? if you do go into clinet.java and search for “pickup” and replace the whole thing with this

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod steve") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (/*newItemID <= 30000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); }

Read full topic

@ZTR_Zac wrote:

its in your player.java

search for

public int maxItemAmount =

change the number next to it.
